pname: How I thought my grandmother to read
pdescription: Sudha Murty describes the determined efforts of an illiterate old lady Krishtakka to make herself literate.

pname: The magic of the lost temple
pdescription: Unfold the secrets hidden in the forest Join the very curious character of Nooni as she unfolds the mystery behind the stepwell.
House of Cards is the story of Mridula, a bright young woman with enormous enthusiasm for life who hails from a Karnataka village.
